title: FBI Conducted 3.4 Million Warrantless Searches of Americans' Data
content: Plus: Trump backers breach election systems, Microsoft tracks Russia's war prep, a new Facebook leak reveals a mess, and Bored Ape Yacht Club gets hacked.
